info.name: Centralized Minimal Tweetdeck
info.description:
The aim of this style is to have a good centralized view in three-column mode. Still, you can enjoy its minimalistic schema in other modes!
p.s. I think heart/like sucks!

" My healing is not in the "heart" of crossroad passengers. Reza Baraheni, Iranian poet"

So I replaced the "heart" with the old-school fave icon, the legendary "star".
info.additionalInfo:
Version 0.3
* I adopted the reference CSS from this: https://userstyles.org/styles/129309/firedeck-enhancements-for-tweetdeck
* Also I adopted some CSS parts from https://userstyles.org/styles/120436/stars-squared-avatars-and-more-for-tweetdeck to replace heart with star.
